name: Fill The Bucket (Sam-Nugget)
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

Use A + D or < + > to move left and right and avoid enemies

Use the mouse to aim and fire projectiles at enemies

This game is my interpretation of the themes:

  • The Sun Is Your Enemy
  • Gravity Wells

The more full the bucket, the faster you will descend. Stay underground for as long as possible to avoid the sun

The sprites are 32x32, but can move within a 64x64 space (i.e. 0.5 pixels at a time)

Not yet implemented:

  • Menu and levels
  • Win and lose screen
  • A way to restart
  • Enemy and background sprite variations
  • Sound
  • Pixel-correct text
